content: band row 1 ch1 working up the front edge fit 6 half_double_crochet into the ends of the rib row then half_double_crochet in the end of each row up the front 32 hdcs count your stitches it s very important you have the same amount of stitches each side inc3 in the top corner stitch half_double_crochet in each stitch around the neck but skip the 4 large holes that were the increase stitches on row1 this helps to round the neck inc3 in the corner stitch and continue placing 1 half_double_crochet in the end of each row down the front working 6 half_double_crochet into the 3 rib row ensure the last half_double_crochet goes in the bottom corner of the front count your stitches making sure you have 32 hdcs down this front too row 2 ch1 and turn half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 ch1 skip 1 stitch half_double_crochet in the next 6 stitches repeat 4 times 5 button holes made half_double_crochet in next stitch this should bring you to the corner stitch inc3 in the corner stitch half_double_crochet around the neck inc3 in the corner and half_double_crochet down the front to bottom stitch row 3 ch1 turn half_double_crochet in same stitch half_double_crochet all the way to bottom of the opposite corner but this time only place 2 half_double_crochet in the corner stitches fo sew in ends i find it easier to add the buttons now as it makes working the sleeves easier pull into shape this can be left hear for a cute little vest if you choose sleeves the sleeves are decreased by skipping the last stitch on most row ch2 at the beginning of each row counts as the first double_crochet unless stated so do not double_crochet in the same stitch as the ch2 attach yarn in the middle of the underarm area ch2 row 1 double_crochet in same place as your ch2 double_crochet around the arm hole fitting 31 dcs around ch2 does not count as a stitch do not join sleeves are worked in row not rounds row 2 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch 31 double_crochet row 3 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch skip last double_crochet in top of previous ch2 30 double_crochet row 4 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch skip last
